    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        public static java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.io.File f,
                            java.lang.String attr)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Return the attribute for the file The trz views are sequentially checked for handling the attr The attr is returned from the first view that supports it.
        Parameters:
        f - file to check for the attribute
        attr - the attribute name
        Returns:
        The attribute object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
